comments.comment: 0:03 Talking about the birth of Elon´s son (Joe: "You were born during a weird time... probably the weirdest") 0:35 Talking about the name of Elon´s son: X Æ A-12 (Joe: "Is it a placeholder?") 6:50 Elon talks about being defined as wealthy. Elon: "In recent years (the word) billionaire has become a pejorative" 14:27 Joe asks Elon how he´s able to get so much done 17:53 Talking about Neuralink 28:49 Talking about "reading" people´s mind 33:41 Joe brings up the topic of aliens in relation to human evolution, and Elon talks about "saving your state", like in a video game 38:41 Elon talks about the concept of consciousness 44:20 Elon brings up the negative aspects of globalization 55:37 Elon talks about the possibility of a "whole-brain interface" (having almost all of your neurons connected to an AI extension of yourself) 57:15 A long discussion on covid-19, including negative reactions to Elon´s twitter messages about the pandemic, opening up vs. endangering others, and China. 1:35:55 Short discussion on smoking. Elon mentions that he helped make the movie "Thank you for smoking". Elon: "Barbequing your lungs is bad news". 1:45:55 Joe asks if Elon has time to exercise. Elon: "I´d prefer not to exercise" 1:47:36 Talking about martial arts. Elon did teakwondo, karate and judo when he was young. He also briefly did Brazilian jiu-jitsu, which Joe is very happy to hear. 1:51:06 Joe asks about the new Tesla Roadster 1:57:20 Joe asks about the Cybertruck demonstration incident, where a "bulletproof" window broke
